Albuquerque.Albuquerque Bernalillo County Library:
The Albuquerque Bernalillo County Library is the public library system serving greater Albuquerque, New Mexico. It includes seventeen branch libraries as well as the downtown Main Library.


== History ==
The Albuquerque Public Library opened on May 1, 1901, replacing the Ladies' Library Association which had operated sporadically since 1883.
